power.title: Anchor the Line
power.fluff: You help an ally stand or guide a friend back into formation

section.name: Target:
section.text: One ally

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target either stands up, or shifts 1 square.

power.title: Back to Back
power.fluff: You take heart from the ally guarding your back

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You assume the Back to Back stance.
Until the stance ends, while you are adjacent to an ally, you and the ally gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls.
The bonus to the ally's attack rolls increases to +2 for attacks granted by you.
When an ally adjacent to you hits with an attack, the bonus to your attack rolls increases to +2 until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Dragon's Tenacity
power.fluff: You and your companions become as fierce and indomitable as dragons, striking harder the more you all are hurt

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be bloodied.

section.name: Target:
section.text: You, and each ally in the burst

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You gain a +2 power bonus to attack attack rolls until the end of your next turn.
Target allies gain a +1 power bonus to attack rolls until the end of your next turn. The bonus increases to +2 if the ally is bloodied.

section.name: Dragonborn:
section.text: If you are a dragonborn, allies gain the increased bonus even if they are not bloodied.
An ally dragonborn increases the attack bonus he or she gains by +1.

power.title: Form a Line
power.fluff: You raise your fist in the air, calling your allies to form a defensive front at your position

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The wall creates a zone of defensive ground until the end of your next turn, and it must include a square you occupy.
You and any ally within the zone gain a +1 power bonus to AC. This increases to +2 while adjacent to you or an ally who is also within the zone.

section.name: Sustain Minor:
section.text: The zone persists until the end of your next turn. You must be either within the zone or adjacent to an ally in the zone to sustain it.

power.title: Forward Observer
power.fluff: Discerning the proper angle of fire, you point out concealed enemies to your allies

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Choose one enemy you can see.

Until the end of your next turn, any ally who can see or hear you doesn't take the normal penalty to attack rolls for cover or concealment when attacking that enemy. The penalties for superior cover and total concealment still apply.

power.title: Get Down!
power.fluff: Your barked order draws attention to you long enough for a covered or concealed ally to hide

section.name: Target:
section.text: One ally in the burst

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target can shift up to one-half his or her speed as a free reaction.
If the target has cover or concealment, he or she can make a Stealth check to become hidden and has a +3 power bonus to the check.

power.title: Guide the Charge
power.fluff: You direct your ally's charge, allowing him or her to strike a deadly blow or to evade counter attacks

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An ally within 10 squares of you charges a creature

section.name: Target:
section.text: The triggering ally in the burst

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target gains your choice of one of the following two benefits:

► On a hit, the target deals additional damage equal to your Intelligence modifier or your Wisdom modifier, and can push the target charged creature up to 2 squares, and then shift up to 2 squares to a square adjacent to it.
► The target gains a bonus to all defenses against attacks triggered by the charge. The bonus equals your Wisdom modifier or your Charisma modifier.

power.title: Guileful Switch
power.fluff: You spring a trap on your opponents, surprising them with your clever stratagem

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: Your turn starts

section.name: Target:
section.text: You, and one ally you can see

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target ally immediately takes his or her next turn, and you delay until his or her next turn would have taken place.

power.title: Inspiring Reaction
power.fluff: As soon as an ally is wounded, you spring forward to keep him or her standing

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You, or an ally adjacent to you takes damage

section.name: Skirmishing Presence:
section.text: The triggering ally can be within 3 squares of you, and you can shift 2 squares to a space adjacent to the ally before resolving the rest of the effect.

section.name: Target:
section.text: The triggering character

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target can spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to his or her healing surge value, plus additional hit points equal to your Wisdom modifier or your Charisma modifier.

power.title: Invigorating Remark
power.fluff: You call to an ally with words of inspiration, pushing him or her to fight on

section.name: Target:
section.text: One ally

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target regains one expended healing surge, and also regains hit points equal to his or her healing surge value.

section.name: Inspiring Presence:
section.text: You can choose for the target to either regain an additional expended healing surge, or to regain additional hit points equal to 5 + your Charisma modifier.

power.title: Leader's Intercession
power.fluff: Brash impulse places you in the attack's path to spare an ally from harm

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An attack hits an ally adjacent to you, but not you

section.name: Target:
section.text: The triggering ally

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You and the target switch places, and the triggering attack hits you instead of the target.
Either you or the target can spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to his or her healing surge value.

power.title: Martial Vigor
power.fluff: When your attack connects, you experience a burst of confidence your allies can share if they follow your lead

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You hit an enemy with a martial melee or ranged attack, or use a martial attack that triggers when you hit with a melee or ranged attack

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You can spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to your healing surge value.

Until the start of your next turn, whenever an ally hits the same target with an attack made during any extra action gained by spending an action point, he or she can also spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to his or her healing surge value.
